title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4603 - Licenses To Conduct Games Of Chance: Issuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4603 - Licenses To Conduct Games Of Chance: Issuance

§ 4603.1 - Approval by municipality
§ 4603.2 - Period within which to make findings and determination
§ 4603.3 - Issuance by clerk
§ 4603.4 - Time when copies must be received by commission
§ 4603.5 - License form
§ 4603.6 - Distribution of copies by clerk
§ 4603.7 - Frequency and time of license periods
§ 4603.8 - Sunday
§ 4603.9 - Effective date of license
§ 4603.10 - Joint licenses
§ 4603.11 - Jurisdiction of license
§ 4603.12 - Limit on licenses issued
§ 4603.13 - Display of license

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 4603

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§101, 104[1], [19], 128; Executive Law, art. 19-B, § 435; General Municipal Law, arts. 9-A, 14-H, §§ 186, 188-a; L. 1976, ch. 960

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
